18.author: Marcus Aurelius
18.quote: The more we value things outside our control, the less control we have.

24.author: Marcus Aurelius
24.quote: The best revenge is not to be like your enemy.

33.author: Seneca
33.quote: Wealth is the slave of a wise man and the master of a fool.

38.author: Seneca
38.quote: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.

39.author: Seneca
39.quote: A man who suffers before it is necessary, suffers more than is necessary.

50.author: Marcus Aurelius
50.quote: The best answer to anger is silence.

51.author: Seneca
51.quote: While we wait for life, life passes.
